text:
Stewart Arnold Brown (January 28, 1942 – July 26, 2019) was a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman. He played for the Toronto Maple Leafs, New York Rangers, Detroit Red Wings, New York Islanders, and Atlanta Flames.
After one season in the World Hockey Association (WHA), Brown retired in 1975.
Brown died on July 26, 2019 in North Kawartha, Ontario at the age of 77.
